The Dragon Era
The era before the Crimson Convergence, when dragons dominated Eldunary. Ended when a mysterious entity known as The Shadow exterminated every dragon â€¦
The Equinox of Power
The battle between the Three Masters â€” Sunlee (Martial Arts), Selvarin (Swords), and Veles (Magic) â€” that ended in a total stalemate. Upon witnessing â€¦
The First Great War

The Golden War
A civil war fought between the North and South of the Goldhelm Kingdom.
War of Fodon
The war that drove the Tharnex race to near-extinction. Vorryn is the sole known survivor on Criozevan.
